flash: Built-in manual pop-up, TTL flash control
liveview: Yes, TTL phase-detection AF, Tripod mode using contrast-detect AF, 100% coverage
meteringtype: TTL- full aperture exposure metering using 1005-pixel RGB sensor
meteringsystem: 3D colour matrix metering II, Centre-weighted, Spot
focusing: TTL phase detection AF, 51 focus points (15 cross-sensors) by Nikon Multi-CAM 3500FX
shutterspeed: 1/8000 - 30sec in steps of 1/3, Â½ or 1EV, Bulb
shutter: Electronically controlled vertical travel focal plane shutter
viewfinder: SLR type with fixed eye-level pentaprism
